General.Name: Eneraqua Technologies PLC
General.Description: Eneraqua Technologies plc provides turnkey solutions for water efficiency and decarbonization through district heating and ground source heat pump systems for social housing, commercial clients, and residential sectors. The company offers air source heat pump, hybrid, and gas multi-occupancy heating systems. It operates in the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, and India. Eneraqua Technologies plc was founded in 2012 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 2 Windmill Street, London, United Kingdom, W1T 2HX
